item.title: How to make a site using Hugo, Github Actions and pages
item.description: This site was build with hugo, Github Actions, Markdown pages and a drop of love. Here is a couple of links I used: hugo is a static site generator, also see a quick start guide Github Actions is a CI/CD building blocks for Github Github Pages is a free hosting for static websites You can setup hugo with Github Actions and Pages using this link Posts can be edited as Markdown documents, syntax cheat sheet is here To be loved you should be nice.
